description: Schema for the rocprofv3 JSON output

rocprofiler-sdk-tool.description: rocprofv3 data per process (each element represents a process)

metadata.description: Metadata related to the profiler session

num_sdma_queues_per_engine.description: Number of SDMA queues per engine

max_engine_clk_fcompute.description: Maximum engine clock for F compute

QueueSizePowerOfTwo.description: Queue size is power of two

is_constant.description: Indicator if the counter value is constant.

is_derived.description: Indicator if the counter value is derived.

pc_sample_instructions.description: Array of decoded instructions matching sampled PCs from pc_sample_host_trap section.

pc_sample_comments.description: Comments matching assembly instructions from pc_sample_instructions array. If debug symbols are available, comments provide instructions to source-line mapping. Otherwise, a comment is an empty string.

size.description: Size of the host function record.

host_function_id.description: ID of the HIP host function.

code_object_id.description: ID of the corressponding code object.

host_function_address.description: Address of the host function registered.

modules_address.description: Address of the hip fat binary registered

workgroup_size_address.description: Address of the work group size.

formatted_host_function_name.description: Formatted name of the device function.

hw_id.description: Describes hardware part on which sampled wave was running.

cu_or_wgp_id.description: Index of compute unit or workgroup processer.

code_object_offset.description: Offset within the object if the latter is known. Otherwise, virtual address of the PC.

exec_mask.description: Execution mask indicating active SIMD lanes of sampled wave.

rocprofiler_dim3_t.description: Position of the workgroup in 3D grid.

size.description: Size of the HIP API record.
Size of the HSA API record.
Size of the Marker API record.
Size of the Marker API record.
Size of the Marker API record.

address.description: Starting address for allocation or freeing memory.

allocation_size.description: Size of memory allocation. Free operations not tracked currently.
